s: 10/10 album printed on a 10/10 vinyl. All of the tracks on the album are great, and they really display Duran Duran's creativity, genius and talent. Other than the classics like Girls on Film or Planet Earth, I recommend listening to Sound of Thunder and Friends of Mine.

s: May 23, 2024 - Long out of print, this exciting reissue marks the first time this iconic collection will be available in the original 1LP and 1CD format, with remastered audio, since their initial release. The albums will be available via Warner Music from 5th July - pre-order here .
